dcterms:creator: M. L. Seghier
A. Ramlackhansingh
J. Crinion
A. P. Leff
C. J. Price
dcterms:description: The PLORAS database includes high resolution T1-weighted structural MRI brain scans acquired from stroke survivors, along with lesion images and tabular data including language and cognitive scores from the Comprehensive Aphasia Test.
dcterms:title: PLORAS database

dcterms:creator: Y. H. Roohani
N. Sajid
P. Madhyastha
C. J. Price
T. M. Hope
dcterms:description: The Stitched MRI dataset consists of 2D images created from 1,211 MRI scans, where each image is formed by stitching together sixty-four axial cross-sectional slices.
dcterms:title: Stitched MRI dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Tzourio-Mazoyer
et al.
dcterms:description: The Grey Matter Regions of Interest (GM-ROI) dataset includes anatomical parcellations of the brain that are used to identify regions relevant to language recovery.
dcterms:title: Grey Matter Regions of Interest (GM-ROI) dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Tzourio-Mazoyer
et al.
dcterms:description: The White Matter Regions of Interest (WM-ROI) dataset includes anatomical parcellations of white matter tracts relevant to language recovery.
dcterms:title: White Matter Regions of Interest (WM-ROI) dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. H. Roohani
N. Sajid
P. Madhyastha
C. J. Price
T. M. Hope
dcterms:description: The Hybrid Stitched MRI dataset combines stitched MRI images with symbolic representations of initial severity, lesion size, and recovery time.
dcterms:title: Hybrid Stitched MRI dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Tzourio-Mazoyer
et al.
dcterms:description: The Hybrid GM-ROI dataset combines grey matter regions of interest with tabular features relevant to language recovery.
dcterms:title: Hybrid GM-ROI dataset

dcterms:creator: N. Tzourio-Mazoyer
et al.
dcterms:description: The Hybrid White Matter Tracts dataset combines white matter tracts with tabular features relevant to language recovery.
dcterms:title: Hybrid White Matter Tracts dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Porter
D. Howard
dcterms:description: The Comprehensive Aphasia Test (CAT) is a standardized assessment tool used to evaluate language abilities in stroke survivors.
dcterms:title: Comprehensive Aphasia Test (CAT)
